-- | Metric spaces.
--   
--   Metric spaces.
@package metric
@version 0.2.0

module Data.Metric.Class
class Metric a where <-> = distance distance = (<->)
(<->) :: Metric a => a -> a -> Double
distance :: Metric a => a -> a -> Double

module Data.Metric.Set
data Discrete a
Discrete :: a -> Discrete a
instance Show a => Show (Discrete a)
instance Eq (Discrete a)
instance Metric (Discrete a)

module Data.Metric.String
newtype Hamming
Hamming :: String -> Hamming
getHamming :: Hamming -> String
newtype Levenshtein
Levenshtein :: String -> Levenshtein
getLevenshtein :: Levenshtein -> String
newtype RestrictedDamerauLevenshtein
RestrictedDamerauLevenshtein :: String -> RestrictedDamerauLevenshtein
getRestrictedDamerauLevenshtein :: RestrictedDamerauLevenshtein -> String
instance Eq Hamming
instance Show Hamming
instance Eq Levenshtein
instance Show Levenshtein
instance Eq RestrictedDamerauLevenshtein
instance Show RestrictedDamerauLevenshtein
instance Metric RestrictedDamerauLevenshtein
instance Metric Levenshtein
instance Metric Hamming

module Data.Metric.Vector.Real
newtype Euclidean
Euclidean :: Vector Double -> Euclidean
getEuclidean :: Euclidean -> Vector Double
newtype Taxicab
Taxicab :: Vector Double -> Taxicab
getTaxicab :: Taxicab -> Vector Double
newtype Chebyshev
Chebyshev :: Vector Double -> Chebyshev
getChebyshev :: Chebyshev -> Vector Double
newtype PostOffice
PostOffice :: Vector Double -> PostOffice
getPostOffice :: PostOffice -> Vector Double
instance Eq Euclidean
instance Show Euclidean
instance Eq Taxicab
instance Show Taxicab
instance Eq Chebyshev
instance Show Chebyshev
instance Eq PostOffice
instance Show PostOffice
instance Metric PostOffice
instance Metric Chebyshev
instance Metric Taxicab
instance Metric Euclidean

module Data.Metric
class Metric a where <-> = distance distance = (<->)
(<->) :: Metric a => a -> a -> Double
distance :: Metric a => a -> a -> Double
data Discrete a
Discrete :: a -> Discrete a

Hamming :: String -> Hamming
getHamming :: Hamming -> String
